channel.title: RogEE Category Sorted Entries: changelog
channel.description: Changes and updates to Michael Rog's "Category Sorted Entries" EE2 plug-in: http://michaelrog.com/ee/category-sorted-entries

item.title: Version 2.0.0
item.description:
• Version 1 is now Category Sorted Entries Lite, available for free at Devot:ee.
  • Version 2 features more parameters, more variables, Custom Channel Fields, faster processing, and much cleaner code.
  • 2.0.0 is a public beta release.
  • Available for purchase/download at Devot:ee.

item.title: Version 2.1.0
item.description:
• Restructured repo/download to match EE system directory structure
  • SQL query fix (re: devot:ee thread 2184)

item.title: Version 2.3.0
item.description: • fixed a bug that prevented the plugin from showing entries from multiple channels (re: devot:ee thread 5309)

item.title: Version 2.3.1
item.description: • Updated the `usage` method to be properly static, to prevent warnings in modern PHP versions.
